meanings.sent1: I saw many culices flying around the garden.
meanings.sent2: The culices were buzzing near the stagnant water.
meanings.sent3: The culices seemed to have a party in the air.
meanings.sent4: The culices danced in the sunlight like tiny fairies.
meanings.sent5: The annoying culices made it hard to enjoy the picnic.

meanings.sent1: The culices in this area carry diseases.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of culices to prevent outbreaks.
meanings.sent3: The culices in the lab were surprisingly well-behaved.
meanings.sent4: The culices swarmed like dark clouds in the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: The hum of culices filled the night with a sense of unease.
